mapper.insert: insert into save_notify values(LPAD(seq_n_id.NEXTVAL,5,'0'), #{target}, #{content}, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), '0', #{type}, #{url})
mapper.select: SELECT ((SELECT SYSDATE FROM DUAL) - (SELECT TO_DATE(#{regTime},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') FROM DUAL ))*24*60*60 FROM DUAL
SELECT content, time, checked, n_id, url FROM save_notify WHERE (target like #{id} OR target like 'all') AND checked like '0' ORDER BY n_id desc
SELECT count(*) FROM save_notify WHERE (target like #{id} OR target like 'all') AND checked like '0'
SELECT COUNT(n_id) FROM save_notify WHERE target like #{id} AND checked like '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE save_notify SET checked = '1', editor = #{m_id}, editdate = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') WHERE n_id like #{n_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT content, time, checked, n_id, url, type, (ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY n_id DESC))r_num FROM save_notify WHERE (target like #{m_id} OR target like 'all') AND checked like '1') WHERE r_num BETWEEN #{startIndex} AND #{endIndex}
